/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees dot the sidewalk, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the scene in light as day turns to night. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, its rays piercing through the scene, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
